thread.title: Britain loses battle for Unilever HQ

title: Britain loses battle for Unilever HQ
text:
Britain loses battle for Unilever HQ 4:06pm GMT - 01:32 
Britain's third biggest company Unilever will scrap its London corporate headquarters and make Rotterdam its sole legal home. As David Pollard reports, the decision by Britain's third largest company is a blow to Prime Minister Theresa May's government almost one year to the day before Brexit.   
Britain's third biggest company Unilever will scrap its London corporate headquarters and make Rotterdam its sole legal home.
